name: Mike The Guitar - The Shooter 48k
description:
Mike is back! The famous rock guitar with his mission: to bring Rock'n Roll into the world!!! But the gang of bad asses: Beethoven, Chopin and Mozart want to stop our little fellow...Our guitar hero has to fight against the classical instrumental stormtroops, before he faces the violent maestros... Mike is brave, but be careful, not to loose sustain. Every time he touches an enemy or the environment he will loose sustain and faith in himself. But harmony heaven is graceful. Elvis himself gives him strength again. There are images of "The King"... Collect them and you can succeed.

"I love  rock and roll
 So put another dime in the jukebox baby ..."

Created 2020

Game by Sebastian Braunert  &Uwe Geiken&Karl McNeil
Loading Screen by Andy Green
Music by Pedro Pimenta & Rich Hollins
Fonts: Damian Guard
